pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
pre_caption: This is a time-lapse video of a dramatic lightning storm over a highway at night. The long exposure captures the movement of cars, creating bright white and red light trails that stretch into the distance. The sky is filled with dark, turbulent clouds that are spectacularly illuminated by frequent, powerful flashes of lightning.
